title: No long term lease required, Large loft apartments, Basketball Court
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Easy freeway access', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Large one bedroom apartments', '-Close to shopping', '-Storage Units', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Large two bedroom apartments', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Basketball Court', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
